channel.title: ::pure Command?
channel.description:
hey guys,
need some help on i whould create a ::pure command and where abotus in the client.java i whould paste it into, if anyone could help i whould be much appreciated
~lewis.

item.title: ::pure Command?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:50, topic:258507”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=341352.msg2643691#msg2643691 date=1233081365]
Change your sendMessage method to ‘public void sM(String s) {’
[/quote]
That’s retarded thing to do. Do you know how many times sendMessage is used? Changing it would be a complete disaster.

just change the line from

sM("You now retain the maximum skill level.");

to

sendMessage("You now retain the maximum skill level."); [/quote]

I simply meant that you if you wanted you could press CTRL+H and take sM and replace it with sendMessage and hit ‘replace all’

Read full topic
